about_the_game:
Last Loremaster is a heart-racing, thrill-chasing ARPG with roguelike elements (à la Hades or Darksiders), where accessing forbidden knowledge and power is as easy as changing your grip.

Play as Jahir–the titular Last Loremaster–as you make your way to the source of the Unravelling, a strange force that undoes and erases everything it touches. Switch between the six elemental Lores (Fire, Water, Earth, Wind, Lightning, and Nature) to crush your enemies and beat back the encroaching Unravelling.

EVISCERATE YOUR ENEMIES WITH ELEMENTAL COMBOS




Seamlessly combine your elemental abilities to eviscerate your enemies with smooth, dynamic combat. Identify your enemies’ weak points with the precision of Wind, then come down on them hard with the fury of Fire in the next moment!

UNLOCK NEW ABILITIES & CHOOSE YOUR BUILD




The other Loremasters didn’t leave much behind– only fragments remain. Upgrade and augment your weapons and gear piece by piece, truly making them your own! Choose which Elemental powers to focus on, unlock new abilities & augments and meld the elements in unique and novel ways!

DEFEND YOUR WORLD FROM THE UNRAVELLING




Explore, defend, and remember. How far has the world fallen? How much is left to save? Last Loremaster features a myriad of different areas to explore and dozens of enemies to overcome, including familiar and new foes alike.

FEATURES:


  • 6 unique ability sets you can switch between at will– one for each forbidden elemental Lore.
  • Fluid, high-octane combat system with physics-based animations.
  • Deep gear customization system, allowing you to choose the way you fight.
  • Stunning fantasy-apocalyptic world with Arabic inspiration and intricate lore.
  • Vast array of dozens of enemies to test your strength and strategy against.
  • Immersive, expressive, and impactful hand-crafted visuals, sound effects, and music

short_description: Harness the power of the six cardinal elements in Last Loremaster, a high-octane ARPG set in a stunning mythological world. Play as Jahir, a powerful Elemental Loremaster combatting the encroaching Unravelling as you seamlessly freeze, burn, crush, and electrocute your foes!
